description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	Features
DIAGRAM-23139 - Add export to SVG format
DIAGRAM-33186 - [Connector] Aspose.Diagram generates straight connectors instead of 90 degree angled connectors

Enhancements
DIAGRAM-33194 - [PDF and Image Rendering] Output font is different from input

Bugs
DIAGRAM-33188 - [License on Mono] Error in licensing component on Mono
DIAGRAM-33195 - [PDF and Image Rendering] Incorrect line breaks in the output PDF and Image
DIAGRAM-33196 - [PDF and Image Rendering] Text inside the table is flipped
summary: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files.
title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET
